description: This mapping has an ODRL privacy policy and the user can (or cant) have access to the data. Depending the token is a valid token.
user_template:
<#assign token="abcdefg">
<#assign webTokenConf=providers("HttpProvider", { "method" : "GET", "url" : "https://helio-dev.linkeddata.es/mappings/details/upm-sensors"})>
<#assign tokensConf=providers("HttpProvider", { "method" : "GET", "url" : "https://helio-rest.auroral-factory.linkeddata.es/api/tokens/data"})>
<#assign tokens=tokensConf?eval>

<#assign policy>
{
 "@context": "http://www.w3.org/ns/odrl.jsonld",
 "@type": "Set",
 "uid": "http://example.com/policy:1010",
 "permission": [{
 	"target": "https://helio-dev.data.linkeddata.es/api/upm-sensors/data",
	"action": "read",
	"constraint": [{
           "leftOperand":  { 
                "@value": "[=token]", 
                "@type": "xsd:string" 
                },
           "operator": "eq",
           "rightOperand":  { 
                "@value": "<#list tokens as tokenStored><#if tokenStored == token>[=tokenStored]<#break></#if></#list>", 
                "@type": "xsd:string" 
                }
       }]
 }]
}
</#assign>

<@action type = "ODRL" data=policy; result>
[=result]
</@action>
solution_template:
<#assign token="nzjvHiFPI6">
<#assign webTokenConf=providers("HttpProvider", { "method" : "GET", "url" : "https://helio-dev.linkeddata.es/mappings/details/upm-sensors"})>
<#assign tokensConf=providers("HttpProvider", { "method" : "GET", "url" : "https://helio-rest.auroral-factory.linkeddata.es/api/tokens/data"})>
<#assign tokens=tokensConf?eval>

<#assign policy>
{
 "@context": "http://www.w3.org/ns/odrl.jsonld",
 "@type": "Set",
 "uid": "http://example.com/policy:1010",
 "permission": [{
 	"target": "https://helio-dev.data.linkeddata.es/api/upm-sensors/data",
	"action": "read",
	"constraint": [{
           "leftOperand":  { 
                "@value": "[=token]", 
                "@type": "xsd:string" 
                },
           "operator": "eq",
           "rightOperand":  { 
                "@value": "<#list tokens as tokenStored><#if tokenStored == token>[=tokenStored]<#break></#if></#list>", 
                "@type": "xsd:string" 
                }
       }]
 }]
}
</#assign>

<@action type = "ODRL" data=policy; result>
[=result]
</@action>
